PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-02512009-02-12,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE DISCLOSURE ON ACCOUNT OPENING BY TELEPHONE REQUEST (AUTHORIZED FOREIGN BANKS) REGULATIONS: amendments were made in Bill C-37 - the paragraphs in section 3 of the Regulations which dealt with calculation of time regarding disclosure via electronic means are deleted from the Regulations. The upcoming Electronic Documents Regulations will set the requirements for communication by electronic means consistently across the acts and regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0054 Publication Date: 2009-03-04
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING THE DISCLOSURE ON ACCOUNT OPENING BY TELEPHONE REQUEST (AUTHORIZED FOREIGN BANKS) REGULATIONS:  amendments were made in Bill C-37  - the paragraphs in section 3 of the Regulations which dealt with calculation of time regarding disclosure via electronic means are deleted from the Regulations.  The upcoming Electronic Documents Regulations will set the requirements for communication by electronic means consistently across the acts and regulations.
